org.apache.hive.spark.client

Interface JobContext


  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface JobContext
    Holds runtime information about the job execution context. An instance of this class is kept on the node hosting a remote Spark context and is made available to jobs being executed via RemoteSparkContext#submit().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Long> getAddedJars()
      Return all added jar path and timestamp which added through AddJarJob.
      File getLocalTmpDir()
      Returns a local tmp dir specific to the context
      Map<String,List<org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaFutureAction<?>>> getMonitoredJobs()
      Return a map from client job Id to corresponding JavaFutureActions.
      <T> org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaFutureAction<T> monitor(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaFutureAction<T> job, SparkCounters sparkCounters, Set<Integer> cachedRDDIds)
      Monitor a job.
      org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc()
      The shared SparkContext instance.

    • Method Detail

      • sc

                                                          SparkCounters sparkCounters,
                                                          Set<Integer> cachedRDDIds)
        Monitor a job. This allows job-related information (such as metrics) to be communicated back to the client.
        Returns:
